local_intent: Perceive the T-block, align to it, set yaw to 90°, perform a 0.1 m push toward +Y (90°), then verify the block is at the goal.
assumptions: Block remains visible or is reacquired by scan
Single push stroke is part of the transfer phase toward the goal
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer step of the global plan: perception via IsObjectVisible/Scan, alignment, set yaw=90, push with distance 0.1 at 90°, then verify goal position.
